import React, { useState } from 'react'; const sections = [ { title: '1. GENERAL USERS', icon: 'üîπ', content: (
  • ‚úÖ You may report a case anonymously.
  • ‚úÖ If you are a witness or informer, ensure your information is real and as accurate as possible.
  • ‚úÖ Try to include:
    • Location (auto/manual)
    • Date & Time (auto/manual)
    • Brief description of what you saw
  • ‚úÖ Use the "Upload Image" option only if it's ethical and necessary.
  • ‚úÖ In case of emergencies, use the SOS button.
‚ö† You MUST NOT:
  • Submit fake or misleading reports.
  • Use this platform to defame or harm others.
  • Misuse identity protection for illegal purposes.
) }, { title: '2. ADMINISTRATORS & VERIFIED AUTHORITIES', icon: 'üîπ', content: (
  • üîê Access is limited and roles are verified.
  • ‚úÖ Admins must verify all reports before approval.
  • ‚úÖ Handle all information with extreme confidentiality.
  • ‚úÖ Share reports only with authorized personnel (Police, Hospital, NGOs).
  • ‚úÖ Maintain logs of access and edits to any report.
  • ‚úÖ Take legal action if misuse is detected.
‚ö† Do not:
  • Change any detail without verification.
  • Share identities of anonymous users publicly.
  • Ignore urgent or SOS-tagged cases.
) }, { title: '3. POLICE / HOSPITAL / VOLUNTEERS (Future Expansion / Optional Roles)', icon: 'üîπ', content: (
  • ‚úÖ Immediate reporting if an unclaimed or unidentified body is found.
  • ‚úÖ Use the "Upload Report" feature responsibly.
  • ‚úÖ Follow up if the body is identified to mark it as "Resolved."
) }, { title: '4. DATA & PRIVACY PROTECTION POLICY', icon: 'üîπ', content: (
  • üîí All data is encrypted and stored securely via [MongoDB Atlas / Google Sheet].
  • üîí Identities of anonymous users are protected under our zero-disclosure policy.
  • üîí Only verified Admins can access full information.
  • üîí Data will be retained as per national digital evidence guidelines and may be accessed by legal authorities if necessary.
) }, { title: '5. ETHICAL STANDARDS', icon: 'üîπ', content: (
  • üïØ Avyakta stands for DIGNITY, even in death.
  • By using this platform, you promise:
    • ‚úÖ To act responsibly
    • ‚úÖ To respect those who have no voice
    • ‚úÖ To support social good, not exploit it
) } ]; export default function Guidelines() { const [open, setOpen] = useState([true, false, false, false, false]); const [accepted, setAccepted] = useState(false); const handleAccordion = idx => { setOpen(prev => prev.map((v, i) => (i === idx ? !v : v))); }; return (

üìö Welcome to Avyakta ‚Äì A platform created with sensitivity, care, and purpose.

Because this platform deals with unclaimed or unidentified cases, it is important to follow proper procedures, respect the sensitivity of the data, and ensure dignity in every step.

üõë This is not a casual reporting site. Read the following guidelines thoroughly before proceeding.
{sections.map((section, idx) => (
{open[idx] && (
{section.content}
)}
))}
‚öñ Legal Note:
Fake reporting, misrepresentation, or data tampering will lead to strict action under Indian Penal Code Sections [IPC 182, 211, 505], and Cyber Crime laws.
üßæ All reports are timestamped and traceable under UID, even anonymous ones, to ensure authenticity.
üì® If you have questions or need assistance, contact: support@avyakta.org or use the Contact Support section.
); }
